title: Twelve Mile Limit
description: "We'll drop anything we're doing [for] a new Randy White novel and be glad we did." ( Denver Post )Randy Wayne White's ninth Doc Ford novel starts out as a fun excursion for four divers off the Florida coast. Two days later only one is found alive - naked atop a light tower in the Gulf of Mexico. What happened during those 48 hours? Doc Ford thinks he's prepared for the truth. He isn't.
author: Randy Wayne White
